articles.title: From Dipika Kakar cooking 20kg biryani for Jhalak cast to Rubina Dilaik and Abhinav Shukla expecting twins; Top TV news of the week - IndiaTimes
articles.description: The last week has been eventful with weddings, Bigg Boss 17 and a lot more. Vineet Raina, Sneha Tomar got hitched while there were many revelations and fights in the Bigg Boss house. Take a look at everything that happened in the whole week.
articles.content: Rubina Dilaik took to her vlog to share about her motherhood journey. The actress made an amusing revelation that they were expecting twins. She said, "I wish to share with you that we are expecting … [+750 chars]
